general.gigTitle: be your wordpress website developer and design or develop a perfect website

sellerCard.description: Get ready to take your online presence to the next level! I'm Manik Ali, your friendly neighborhood web developer with over 3 years of experience. Let's create a website that will make your business soar! I promise to deliver a website that will not only increase sales and leads, but also put a smile on your face. So, what do you say? Ready to level up? Contact me now!

description.content:
Hi, this is Manik Ali, I am a professional Website Developer/Designer. In this gig, I am offering

Seo-Friendly, Responsive & Professional WordPress Website Design Service for Small and Medium size Businesses.


As I am experienced with coding languages like HTML, CSS, js, PHP, etc so I know how to really customize all aspects of your WordPress website.


I can fulfill any of your custom requirements with WordPress Website Design Services including contact forms, scheduling/appointment booking, credit card processing, and much more.


Here is what you can expect if we work together:


  • Secure WordPress Installation
  • Installation of Premium Theme
  • Plugins Setup & Configuration
  • SSL Setup
  • Contact Forms
  • Image slider
  • Mailchimp
  • Landing Page Setup
  • Social Media Share
  • All Device Responsive design
  • Page speed optimization
  • E-commerce Functionality


I Can Build These Types of sites:


  • E-commerce
  • Business
  • Blogs
  • Education (School, College, Hospital Management System)
  • Corporate
  • Entertainment
  • Services Website Design
  • Landing Page
  • Portfolio


Note: You Must Contact With Me Before Placing Any Order.


Thank You!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need hosting and domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you need it. but if don't have then I can help you buy a domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I make changes to my website when you're done?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can. But if you don't understand how to do certain things. then will be happy to help you out.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be beautiful and professional?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I guarantee a beautiful and professional website for your business and that is why I have also offered unlimited revisions to make sure your website is up to your taste.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website Mobile Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Mobile-friendly websites are vital. I create flawless sites, delivering seamless user experiences on all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be set-up for SEO?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: When I design and develop websites, I follow best practices and avoid unnecessary code. This approach optimizes your website for search engines and ensures it loads quickly on any device, providing a smooth and user-friendly experience

packageList.title: Small WordPress Website
packageList.description: Custom 1 - 5 page WordPress Website Designed from Scratch. Responsive and SEO friendly Website.

Responsive and SEO friendly Website.

Responsive and SEO friendly Website.

reviews.comment: Manik Ali delivered top-notch work with exceptional professionalism and attention to detail in website development. He was prompt, deeply understood my needs, and maintained a polite demeanor throughout. Muy buen trabajo, a tiempo y con una gran capacidad para resolver. Estoy muy contento con su trabajo y profesionalismo.

Again every time I hire these guys the work is amazing!!!

Will hire again and again for every issue I have!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your positive feedback!
